technologies.title: Project Management Tools
technologies.items: Jira, Redmine, Asana, Trello, Notion, Google Workspace, Microsoft Office Suite, Excel, Odoo

technologies.title: Programming Languages & Frameworks
technologies.items: Java, PHP, Scala, Akka HTTP, MySQL, Android Studio

missions: Designed, developed, and implemented a user-friendly learning game application for Android using Java and Android Studio, enhancing learning experiences for users.
Created a PHP RESTful API for data retrieval.
Developed a PHP-based dashboard for administrators, facilitating efficient content management, user account management, and data analysis.
Managed a portfolio of over 15 web projects, consistently meeting deadlines and achieving positive client feedback for all engagements.
Oversaw communications with stakeholders, ensuring alignment with clients and internal teams.
Collaborated with developers on debugging, server configuration, and security monitoring, reducing technical issues by 25%.
Led cross-functional teams, adhering to project timelines, and ensuring key deliverables were completed on schedule.
Tracked project budgets and client invoicing, ensuring financial accuracy and contractual compliance.
Monitored key performance indicators (KPIs) and project costs, ensuring optimal resource allocation and alignment with business objectives.
Facilitated Agile ceremonies for a team of 8-10 developers, removing obstacles and improving sprint efficiency.
Conducted technical interviews and code reviews, supporting final hiring decisions.
Coordinated communication between developers, product owners, and project managers, ensuring alignment on project goals and deliverables.
Acted as a key coordinator between the project manager, who interfaced with clients to gather requirements, and freelance developers, translating client needs into detailed technical specifications.
Collaborated with freelance developers on a high-priority project, providing detailed specifications and conducting daily check-ins to ensure progress and alignment.
Reviewed and tested deliverables, ensuring adherence to quality standards.
Developed microservices in Scala with Akka HTTP.
Created RESTful APIs for efficient and secure data exchange between microservices.
Connected microservices to MySQL, designed schemas, and optimized data storage.
